description: Text is perfectly justified edge-to-edge (left and right margins aligned)
steps: Step 1: Load example German or Afrikaans text
Step 2: Render to PDF preview
Step 3: Verify text fills from left margin to right margin
Step 4: Check there is no ragged right edge
Step 5: Verify consistent spacing between words
Step 6: Export to PDF and verify justification is maintained

description: Long compound words hyphenate properly at line end
steps: Step 1: Load text with long German compound words
Step 2: Set narrow page width to force line breaks
Step 3: Verify compound words break with hyphen at line end
Step 4: Verify the continuation appears on the next line
Step 5: Check the gloss/translation follows the word parts correctly

description: Ruby/gloss text can wrap to next line without creating gaps
steps: Step 1: Load text with words that have long glosses
Step 2: Verify glosses don't create horizontal gaps in the text
Step 3: Check that interlinear elements flow naturally
Step 4: Verify the overall text block remains justified

description: Book title page has elegant professional typography
steps: Step 1: Create/load a book with title
Step 2: Verify title page uses large elegant serif font
Step 3: Check title is centered on its own page
Step 4: Verify subtitle/language info appears below title
Step 5: Check for decorative elements (lines, flourishes) if applicable
Step 6: Export to PDF and verify title page looks professional

description: Chapter headers have professional styling with proper spacing
steps: Step 1: Load text with multiple chapters
Step 2: Verify chapter headers use elegant typography
Step 3: Check for drop cap or decorative first letter option
Step 4: Verify generous whitespace above and below chapter headers
Step 5: Check chapters start on new pages (recto/odd pages preferred)
Step 6: Export to PDF and verify chapter styling

description: Verse numbers are styled correctly (superscript, muted, non-intrusive)
steps: Step 1: Load biblical text with verse numbers
Step 2: Verify verse numbers appear as superscript
Step 3: Check verse numbers use smaller font size
Step 4: Verify verse numbers don't break text flow or justification
Step 5: Check verse numbers are visually distinct but not distracting

description: Edit mode updates underlying JSON and re-renders preview
steps: Step 1: Load text and render preview
Step 2: Click on a word to enter edit mode
Step 3: Change the gloss/translation text
Step 4: Save the edit
Step 5: Verify the preview updates with the new text
Step 6: Export to PDF and verify the edit appears in output
Step 7: Verify the JSON data structure was updated

description: PDF margins are correct for KDP book binding
steps: Step 1: Set page size to standard KDP trim (6x9 inches)
Step 2: Verify inner/gutter margin is larger than outer margin
Step 3: Check left pages have gutter on right side
Step 4: Check right pages have gutter on left side
Step 5: Export to PDF and measure margins match KDP requirements

description: Page numbers appear correctly in footer (alternating position)
steps: Step 1: Load enough text to generate multiple pages
Step 2: Export to PDF
Step 3: Verify odd pages have page number on right
Step 4: Verify even pages have page number on left
Step 5: Check page numbers use appropriate font and size

description: Overall PDF output looks like a professionally typeset book
steps: Step 1: Load complete example text (German or Afrikaans)
Step 2: Export to PDF
Step 3: Open PDF and review as if buying from Amazon
Step 4: Check text justification is perfect throughout
Step 5: Check typography is elegant and consistent
Step 6: Check margins and spacing are professional
Step 7: Check chapter/verse styling is polished
Step 8: Verify PDF is ready to upload to Amazon KDP without modifications
